articles.title: The Sims 4 Eco Lifestyle: Meat curing a possible new gameplay feature? - Extra Time Media
articles.description: A new GIF, published by The Sims 4, shows what looks like a sort of meat curing process which could form part of the new Eco Lifestyle expansion pack.
articles.content:
